title: Mordicine
desc:
Post 111
- Gain 2 <:ghost_charge:1240975548331720734>
- **Have a Nice Death**
 - Gain a random **Have a Nice Death** item upon use UNLESS below condition applies AND you got this item from this attribute.
 - Lose 1 <:charge:1240849067362488403> instead of gaining 2 <:ghost_charge:1240975548331720734> if you've already used 2+ **Have a Nice Death** items this game.
